sentences.sentence: The initialisation codes can be found in the manual.
sentences.translation: 在初始化代码中可以找到该手册。

sentences.sentence: If required configuration elements are missing at application initialisation then fail fast and fail loudly.
sentences.translation: 如果在应用程序初始化的时候缺少需要的配置元素，那么它就会立即崩溃，并且效果明显。

sentences.sentence: This needs to happen early in the VM initialisation process before any of the native calls in the core classes are used.
sentences.translation: 这需要在VM初始化过程的早期进行处理，而且要在核心类尚未进行任何本地调用之前进行处理。
